title.rendered: Northwestern Air in Fort Smith, Northwest Territories

content.rendered:
Northwestern Air is an airline based in Fort Smith, Northwest Territories, Canada. It operates scheduled passenger services to 9 destinations in 3 territories/provinces with over 106 scheduled flights per week, as well as undertaking ad hoc charters and long term charter contracts for various corporations throughout Canada and the USA. The airline was established in 1965. Its main base is Fort Smith Airport.

 

Northwestern Air in Fort Smith, Northwest Territories Contact Address, Phone, Working hours and Website

Address: 23 Airport Rd.
PO Box 23
Fort Smith NT, X0E 0P0

Phone: 1.877.872.2216 (in Canada only)
1.867.872.2216

Email: reservations@nwal.ca, cargo@nwal.ca, maintenance@nwal.ca
charters@nwal.ca

Working hours:
Reservations
Open: Monday – Friday 8:00AM – 5:00PM
Closed: Saturday & Sunday

Flight Ops & Charters
Open: Monday – Friday 7:00am – 6:00pm

Aircraft Maintenance
Open: Monday – Friday 8:30am – 5:00pm
Closed: Saturday & Sunday

Northwestern Air Official website: https://nwal.ca/

Types of Planes / Air craft available with Northwestern Air

Total fleet: 14

  • British Aerospace Jetstream
  • Cessna 172
  • Cessna 185 Skywagon
  • Cessna 206
  • Cessna 210
  • DHC-3 Otter

Northwestern Air Baggage Allowance

View Northwestern Air Hand | Cabin baggage, Checked baggage, Excess baggage charges, over weight baggage charges, over size baggage charges in the above link.

Queries handled by Northwestern Air Customer care:

Schedule, eBooking, Rescheduling, Track and Trace, Charter Service Queries, Trucking service Queries, e-claims Flight Information, Missing Luggage, Delayed Flights. Pharma, pets, valuable, perishable goods and extra care shipment queries.

Is there any problem / complaint with reaching the Northwestern Air in Fort Smith, Northwest Territories Address or Phone number? Please report any issues using the below comment form.

Rate your experience with the Northwestern Air in Fort Smith, Northwest Territories: (click on the stars below)
